Reviews.Title: “A friendly hotel with great location”
Reviews.Author: Larzon67
Reviews.Content: vine look impressive outside wanna stay else berlin value money excellent clean beds comfortable bathrooms modern etc castro vine friendly efficient staff serviceminded greeting smile hotel perfectly situated wonderful schöneberg probably berlin definitely coming

Reviews.Title: “Super choice for a budget hotel in Berlin”
Reviews.Author: Nelsontouch
Reviews.Content: nicely decorated modern style staff friendly helpful breakfast expensive hotel zurich night excellent location sights walking distance bussubway handy variety restaurants gay friendly straight clientele neither team scared reasonably priced

Reviews.Title: “Excellently sited Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Nash29London
Reviews.Content: usually stay 5 star hotel berlin time opted stay beginning march 4 nights pleasantly surprised location excellent short walk kadewe department store rest kudam appointed clean adequate bar doubles breakfast restaurant beautifully warm cosy meeting breakfast generous importantly selection broad products 1st class quality wide selection wines drinks available evening real bonus staff rarely pleasure deal genuinely dedicated educated staff trouble pleasure meeting hotels manager obvious service emanating definitely firm favourite berlin highly recommend visit excellent italian restaurant street approx called trattoria genuine italian restaurant

Reviews.Title: “Good location, loud heating”
Reviews.Author: Mark L
Reviews.Content: booked hotel online deal location cheap parking plain cheaply decorated worst heating loud sounds nonstop earplugs sleep filter sound coming outside inside dont befitting fourstar hotel bed bathroom highlights breakfast overall book hotel especially winter heating

Reviews.Title: “Christmas Markets”
Reviews.Author: KeithandMeg
Reviews.Content: returned short visit markets comfortable stay vine breakfast excellent choice served bar air miles trip dont actual cost staying consider returning paying ourselves price

Reviews.Title: “A great hotel in a very good location”
Reviews.Author: MogirlLondon
Reviews.Content: hotel 7 8 minutes slow walk catch hoponhopoff sightseeing bus tours ubahn public transport buses stop road hotel restaurants close hotel vine feels incredibly comfy safe friendly plus free wifi cant sneezed twin wet type bathroom lovely cleaned daily spotless returning staff friendly professional couldnt recommend hotel highly

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Value”
Reviews.Author: davidcalderbank
Reviews.Content: nice hotel clean free wifi bonus booked breakfast €11 breakfast class staff friendly smile hotel minutes bars shop definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Good value and location”
Reviews.Author: Toronto_Frank
Reviews.Content: nice hotel staff pleasant helpful close berlins gay districts convenient bars restaurants 10 minute walk department store clean bit value price wifi trip password days issue duvet bed hot cooler evening september

Reviews.Title: “A disappointment”
Reviews.Author: Joolsey
Reviews.Content: return visit hotel enjoyed visit ago time disappointed started brusque rude received arrived receptionist time day stay helpful day door key thrown returned tried charge breakfasts didnt day couldnt seat breakfast crowded disappointed

Reviews.Title: “Stupid name ~ Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Ezpez
Reviews.Content: excellent reception staff helpful cheerful free german reception spotlessly clean moving fresh everyday own fresh hand bath towels everyday excellent mattress appreciated space move bed airconditioning stuffy unless window left fortunately excellent warm weather stay bathroom excellent walk shower annoying cabinets bath cope water hot plenty shelving toiletries sized wardrobe folding doors window view street quiet excellent location trains shops internet access eventually sorted stay

Reviews.Title: “MUSTY”
Reviews.Author: GenuineJudge
Reviews.Content: hotel located centrally wittenberg nollendorfplatz stations aware musty lack ventilation breathing chest morning woke dry throats stagnant smoke guess vents linked reception apart staff appeared rude bothered dealing keys please talk staff people dated especailly beds hard pillows uncomfortable cleaning staff excellent immaculatethe hotel quiet total overhall cheap stay health oh shocked literally times static carpet

Reviews.Title: “Good Budget Hotel”

Reviews.Content: hotel base exploring berlin near bahn underground stations stops bahn overground trains hotel quiet street little traffic noise expect city hotel anyway restaurant bar comment

Reviews.Title: “Quiet”
Reviews.Author: latalay
Reviews.Content: clean hotel close berlin city centers figured breakfast wifi payed extra parking okay price hotel ten hotels countries pay advance stay

Reviews.Title: “Great budget choice”
Reviews.Author: EastSussexToad
Reviews.Content: nice hotel located public transport network berlin huge public transport helpful staff breakfast plenty choice worth 10 euro fill otherwise plenty coffee eat extremely reasonable rates city paid 50 euronight excluding breakfast based experience recommended
